original_text: ‘I tell you that I am against those prophets! They say that they speak messages from me. But they are using each other's ideas. ‘I tell you that I am against those prophets! They say that they speak messages from me. But they are using each other's ideas.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이라 그러므로 보라 서로 내 말을 도둑질하는 선지자들을 내가 치리라

sentences.original_text: that I am against those prophets
They say that they speak messages from me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내게서 난 말을 한다고 말하나니

sentences.original_text: But they are using each other's ideas
